changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID() CONSTRAINT PK_TIMESERIES_HEADER PRIMARY KEY, START_TIME DATETIME2 NOT NULL, END_TIME DATETIME2 NOT NULL, IMPORT_TIME DATETIME2 NOT NULL DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() INDEX INDEX_IMPORT_TIME, TASK_COMPLETION_TIME DATETIME2 NOT NULL INDEX INDEX_TASK_COMPLETION_TIME, TASK_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL INDEX INDEX_TASK_ID, WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL INDEX INDEX_WORKFLOW_ID )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER
